name: PATH 2016
description:
Pace Aptitude & Talent Hunt (PATH 2016) - The mega talent hunt to reward meritorious students! Earn your registration fees worth Rs.500 by playing and learning through the education game.
Terms & Conditions
1) Information entered (contact number, class, email etc) by the students will be verified before the discount is offered
2) In case of any malpractice is observed in your score - Eduisfun holds the rights to withdraw the discount offers
3) The discount offered will only be valid at the centre entered at the time of playing game
